renderer::TextureGenMode

renderer::TextureGenMode Namespace Reference

Texture generation modes.


Enumerations

  OBJECT_LINEAR, EYE_LINEAR, SPHERE, REFLECTION,

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
OBJECT_LINEAR  Generate with respect to object.
EYE_LINEAR  Generate with respect to watcher.
SPHERE  Generate spherically.
REFLECTION  Generate for reflection usage.
NORMAL  Generate using normal values.
